marno.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • marno.server.Server
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RMIServer, SocketServer

    abstract class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles server functionality that is independent of the underlying protocol implementation (RMI or sockets).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String DATE_FORMAT
      The format for message timestamps.

      The timestamp formatter, for each message.

      The list of messages that have been added so far.

      The port the server is listening on.

      The secure random value generator.

      A hash map of sessions associated with a session ID string.
      private static java.util.regex.Pattern USERNAME_PATTERN
      The pattern usernames must match against to be considered valid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(int serverPort,
              java.lang.String historyFilename)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Prepares the server, loading previous messages from the history file.
        Parameters:
        serverPort - the port on which to listen for client connections
        historyFilename - the filename for the message history file to open
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the history file could not be opened

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public abstract void run()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Makes the server run indifinitely.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an exception occurs during execution

      • addMessage

        protected void addMessage(java.lang.String sessionId,
                          java.lang.String message)
                   throws InvalidSessionException
        Adds a new message to the list of received messages, then broadcasts it to all clients.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the client's session, for authentication
        message - the client's message contents
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session ID is invalid

      • addPrivateMessage

        protected void addPrivateMessage(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                 java.lang.String destUsername,
                                 java.lang.String message)
                          throws InvalidSessionException,
                                 UserNotFoundException
        Relays a private message from one user to another, by username.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the client's session, for authentication
        destUsername - the username of the intended recipient
        message - the client's message contents
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session ID is invalid
        UserNotFoundException - if the specified username was not found

      • addUser

        protected java.lang.String addUser(Session session)
                            throws InvalidUsernameException
        Adds a new user with its own session associated. Only succeeds if no other user has that username and if the username contains only alphanumeric characters, '-' and '_'. On success, broadcasts a status message notifying clients that a new user has joined.
        Parameters:
        session - the new session to add
        Returns:
        the newly-added session's unique ID
        Throws:
        InvalidUsernameException - if the username is taken or contains invalid characters

      • removeUser

        protected void removeUser(java.lang.String sessionId)
                   throws InvalidSessionException
        Removes a user from the list of active users. On success, broadcasts a status message notifying clients that a user has left.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the client's session, for authentication
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session ID is invalid

      • renameUser

        protected void renameUser(java.lang.String sessionId,
                          java.lang.String newUsername)
                   throws InvalidSessionException,
                          InvalidUsernameException
        Changes a user's username to a new value, if the new value is valid. On success, broadcasts a status message notifying clients that a user has changed their username.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the client's session, for authentication
        newUsername - the new value for the client's username
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - if the session ID is invalid
        InvalidUsernameException - if the username is taken or contains invalid characters

      • broadcastMessage

        private void broadcastMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Broadcasts a message publicly to all clients. Each message is prepended with a timestamp.
        Parameters:
        message - the message's contents

      • broadcastUserList

        private void broadcastUserList()
        Broadcasts the current list of usernames to all clients.

      • checkSessionActive

        private boolean checkSessionActive(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Checks that the specified session is still active. A session is considered active if it can respond in a timely manner to pings. If it is no longer active, it is removed.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the session to check
        Returns:
        true if the session is active, false otherwise

      • checkSessionExists

        private boolean checkSessionExists(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Checks that a session has been registered with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the session to check
        Returns:
        true if such a session was found, false otherwise

      • findSession

        private Session findSession(java.lang.String username)
        Attempts to find a session associated with a specific username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to search for
        Returns:
        the session if found, null otherwise

      • getNextSessionId

        private java.lang.String getNextSessionId()
        Gets a new unique session ID for a new session.
        Returns:
        a new randomly-generated string ID

      • getSessionIdByUsername

        private java.lang.String getSessionIdByUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Finds the session ID associated with a specific username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to search for
        Returns:
        the session ID if found, null otherwise

      • getUserList

        private java.lang.String[] getUserList()
        Returns a sorted list of users.
        Returns:
        the sorted list of users on the server

      • isUsernameAvailable

        private boolean isUsernameAvailable(java.lang.String username)
        Checks if a username has not been taken by another user and if it is a valid username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to check
        Returns:
        true if the username is valid and not in use, false otherwise

      • loadMessageHistory

        private void loadMessageHistory(java.io.File historyFile)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all previous messages from the history file.
        Parameters:
        historyFile - the file to load messages from, ready to be read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file could not be opened

      • registerSession

        private java.lang.String registerSession(Session session)
        Registers a new session with the server, associating it a unique ID.
        Parameters:
        session - the session to register
        Returns:
        the session ID of the newly-registered session

      • isUsernameValid

        private static boolean isUsernameValid(java.lang.String username)
        Checks if a username matches all the criteria on usernames.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to check
        Returns:
        true if it is valid, false otherwise
